mapper.select: SELECT level, articleNO, parentNO, title, content, imageFileName, writeDate, id from t_board START WITH parentNO = 0 CONNECT BY PRIOR articleNO = parentNO ORDER SIBLINGS BY articleNO DESC

SELECT * FROM( select ROWNUM as recNum, LVL, articleNO parentNO,title, id, writeDate from (select LEVEL as LVL, articleNO,parentNO,title,id, writeDate from t_board START WITH parentNO=0 CONNECT BY PRIOR articleNO = parentNO ORDER SIBLINGS BY articleNO DESC)) where recNum between (#{section}-1)*100+(#{pageNum}-1)*10+1 and (#{section}-1)*100+#{pageNum}*10
mapper.insert: INSERT into t_board(articleNO, title, content, imageFileName, id) Values(#{articleNO}, #{title}, #{content}, #{imageFileName}, #{id})
